spec_data.Name: compat-wxGTK3-gtk2-gl
spec_data.Description:
OpenGL (a 3D graphics API) add-on for the wxWidgets library.
wxWidgets is the GTK port of the C++ cross-platform wxWidgets
GUI library, offering classes for all common GUI controls as well as a
comprehensive set of helper classes for most common application tasks,
ranging from networking to HTML display and image manipulation.

This is a version linked with old GTK version for compatibility with
programs that don't work with more recent GTK yet.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 02:28:00 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: OpenGL add-on for the wxWidgets library
